entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 04:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: SSE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow early this morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
